songs.title: Tsmm
songs.lyrics:
My soul rises up
When the sun sets down
I hang up the phone
When I don't hear a sound

All that I know is I hope that you know
That I'm doing fine
All that I know is I hope that you know
Lord to keep shining

(2:00 instrumental)

We lay down the tones
When the sun hits the ground
What good is the phone
When it doesnt make a sound?

All that I know is I hope that you know
That we're all doing fine
All that I know is I hope that you know
Lord to keep shining, shining

(2:00 instrumental)
